flawed_nl_solution:
The burritos have 10*120=<<10*120=1200>>1200 calories
That means he gets 1200/6=<<1200/6=20>>20 calories per dollar
The burgers get 5*400=<<5*400=2000>>2000 calories
So he gets 2000/8=<<2000/8=250>>250 calories per dollar
So he gets 250-20=<<250-20=230>>230 more calories per dollar from the burgers
#### 230

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 20. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
